channel.title: Paper Weights: Daily AI Research Briefing
channel.description: Every morning, two hosts break down the AI papers that actually matter — one explains the science, one asks where the money is. Hundreds of papers filtered down to the dozen or so that could become products, disrupt markets, or change how you build. 15 minutes. No filler.
channel.ns0:author: Paper Weights

item.title: Paper Weights — February 12, 2026 — Data Repetition Beats Data Scaling
item.description:
Deep Dives: • Data Repetition Beats Data Scaling • Safety Recovery in Reasoning Models Is Only a Few Early Steering Steps Away.
Quick Hits: • Can Large Language Models Make Everyone Happy? • On the Robustness of Knowledge Editing for Detoxification • The Landscape of Prompt Injection Threats • RePO: Bridging On-Policy and Off-Policy Learning • Weight Decay Improves Language Model Plasticity • Why Does RL Generalize Better Than SFT? • MoEEdit: Routing-Stable Knowledge Editing for MoE LLMs

item.title: Paper Weights — February 11, 2026 — The Geometry of Thinking
item.description:
In this episode:
• The Geometry of Thinking • Reading the Model's Mind Before It Speaks • The Safety Trilemma • Finding the Point of No Return • The Token Efficiency Problem • We Finally Know Why Reasoning Works

item.title: Paper Weights — February 10, 2026 — iGRPO — Self-Feedback-Driven LLM Reasoning
item.description:
In this episode:
• iGRPO — Self-Feedback-Driven LLM Reasoning • Next Concept Prediction — Beyond Token-Level Thinking • CoRefine — Confidence-Guided Self-Refinement • DirMoE — Dirichlet-Routed Mixture of Experts • InternAgent — The Robot Scientist • Misaligned Actions in Computer-Use Agents • Goal-Directedness in Language Model Agents

item.title: Paper Weights — February 09, 2026 — InftyThink+ (Reasoning Efficiency)
item.description:
In this episode:
• InftyThink+ (Reasoning Efficiency) • Generative Meta-Model of LLM Activations (Interpretability) • DAWN (Diffusion LLM Speedup) • Agentic Overconfidence • Endogenous Steering Resistance • Multi-Objective Alignment Interference • Halluverse Multilingual Hallucination Benchmark
